post:
**On behalf of Estnoc.ee i can offer VPS and Dedicated Servers from Estonia, Finland, Sweden, Russia, Romania, Netherlands, Norway and Switzerland**. Almost every server you can configure to match your needs while ordering one.

VPS offers are listed first and Dedicated Servers you can find in the end of the listing.

**Why choose us?** Well, we offer flexible support on all of our services and response time is avg. 15-60 minutes. We choose ONLY the best networking partners to avoid downtimes by networking side. Aswell we use branded hardware and servers. Most important, we do not oversell our servers. Our prices are reasonable and fit well to customers who DEMAND services that are STABLE! We offer multi locations of servers and we are expanding rapidly! Just shortly: you get exactly what you payd for.

Like us on [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/Estnoc.dot.ee)! Follow us on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/estnoc_ee)!

Please visit homepage at http://www.estnoc.ee

**Payments accepted:** Paypal, CreditCard, Skrill, BitCoin, LiteCoin, DogeCoin, PeerCoin, MoneyGram and bank transfer. **Got questions? **please send us an email to sales@estnoc.ee

Take a look at our **[Terms Of Service](https://www.estnoc.ee/terms-of-services)** if you got questions a la what is allowed on our servers or what's not. Example: Torrent is allowed on all locations as long its used for legal content and etc...

**Networking information:** For routing/peering partners and information about networking please take a look [HERE](http://www.estnoc.ee/whmcs/knowledgebase.php?action=displaycat&catid=4)

**Following operating systems are possible to install on all of our servers:** CentOS, Debian, FreeBSD, FedoraCore, Ubuntu, Windows Server 2008 R2 Web/Standard/Datacentre, Windows Server 2012 R2 Essentials/Standard/Datacentre and if you don't see your required op sys in list, let us know and we can install it for you.

**We use KVM.** Anyone who's familiar with KVM virtualization knows, it's almost impossible to oversell it. Because KVM gives dedicated resources for each VPS and storage inside its own container. You can manage your VPS in SolusVM, VNC over IP or in our EstNOC Customer Portal (reinstall, reboot,start,stop and ect). Each VPS have 1 IPv4 address for free, the rest will be charged €3/month. For those who need webhosting manager, we can offer cPanel/WHM VPS Optimized (€15/mo) and DirectAdmin (€6/mo).

**VPS OFFERS:**

**Estonian, Finnish and Swedish KVM VPS packages with 100% SSD Storage** (instant provision after successful payment): Estonia and Sweden - dmca free zones
1.KVM vps Starter Linux EE & SE: 256 MB ram memory, 5 GB SSD storage (can upgrade), 1 CPU core, 1 IPv4, 50 Mbit uplink with 500 GB traffic (can upgrade)

**Price starts at 5.5usd a month on quarterly payment!** No SetUP fee!! Order this VPS package from [Estonia](https://www.estnoc.ee/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=118), [Finland](https://www.estnoc.ee/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=150) or [Sweden](https://www.estnoc.ee/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=132)

Take a look at all Estonian VPS offers HERE Take a look at all Finnish VPS offers HERE Take a look at all Swedish VPS offers HERE

**Russian, Romanian, Netherlands and Norwegian KVM VPS packages** (instant provision after successful payment): Norway is DMCA free zone.
1.KVM vps Starter Linux RU/RO/NL/NO: 256 MB ram memory, 5 GB Raid10 storage, 1 CPU core, 1 IPv4, 50 Mbit uplink with 500 GB traffic (can upgrade), Add-On's: cPanel

**Price starts at 5.5usd a month on quarterly payment!** No SetUP fee!! Order this VPS package from [Russia](https://www.estnoc.ee/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=113), [Romania](https://www.estnoc.ee/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=41), [Netherlands](https://www.estnoc.ee/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=1) and [Norway](https://www.estnoc.ee/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=104)

Please take a look at all Russian VPS offers [HERE](http://www.estnoc.ee/whmcs/cart.php?gid=14) Please take a look at all Romanian VPS offers [HERE](http://www.estnoc.ee/whmcs/cart.php?gid=12) Please take a look at all Dutch VPS offers [HERE](http://www.estnoc.ee/whmcs/cart.php?gid=1) Please take a look at all Norwegian VPS offers [HERE](http://www.estnoc.ee/whmcs/cart.php?gid=26) You can find all of the Swiss VPS offers [HERE](http://www.estnoc.ee/whmcs/cart.php?gid=30)

**<del>DEDICATED SERVERS:</del>**

**Intel Core i3-2100 Entry Level from Netherlands (GreenHouse DC, Naaldwijk NL)**

CPU Intel Core i3 2100 3.10Ghz, 2GB ddr3 ram (upgreadable), 1x 500gb HDD (upgreadable to 4x HDD/SSD), 1 usable ipv4, ipv6 on request, 100mbit uplink (upgreadable), 50 TB monthly traffic

Price for this server is 42.97USD per month in monthly payment and 31.95USD per month in yearly payment. NO SetUP fee! Delivered in less than 24H! Order it from [HERE](https://www.estnoc.ee/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=102)

We have in stock A LOT of servers in various hardware combinations. Also we offer 100TB, Unmetered traffic, 10GE uplinks etc. In order to see all of our offers,please click on links you see below:
